intro.description: This cheat sheet guides you through the process of creating individual users and assign them to the created roles.

item.title: Log into the @productname@ Portal
item.description:
To create a user in this tutorial, you must first log on to the @productname@ Portal:
1. The start URL for the Support-Case Process Portal is:
"http://hostname:port/Support-Case"
2. Log on with the default administrator's user ID and password: "motu/motu".
3. In the upper left corner of the portal, select the Administration perspective.

item.title: Create a User and Assign to Callcenter Agent Role
item.description:
To create a user, assign him the role Callcenter Agent and make him a member of ACME Headquarters:
1. In the Administration Views section select the Participant Management view.
2. Click the Create User button in the All Users section toolbar.
3. In the appearing dialog enter the ID, Name and Password for the new user.
4. Drag and drop the user to role "Callcenter Agent" in the Participant Tree.

item.title: Create a User and Assign to Engineer Role
item.description:
Now the role of the Engineer has to be filled. To create this user, assign him the role Engineer and make him a member of ACME Headquarters:
1. In the Administration Portal screen select the Participant Management view.
2. Click the Create User button.
3. In the appearing dialog set the ID, Name and Password for the new user.
4. Close the dialog with Apply. 5. Drag and drop the user to role "Engineer".
